name: Boybeads for HIV/AIDS Prevention- Red Sponge Coral It's a Boy Natural stone bracelet
description:
Boybeads for HIV/AIDS Prevention- Red Sponge Coral It's a Boy Natural stone bracelet for World Aids Day.

FREE SHIPPING IN USA.

This special edition handmade bracelet from Boybeads is made in New York from natural red sponge coral in 14mm size with palm wood 14mm and our signature "It's a Boy" charm.

$10 from the sale of each bracelet will be donated to Whitman-Walker Clinic in Washington, DC to fund free HIV testing and healthcare.

http://www.whitman-walker.org/

name: Boybeads for HIV/AIDS Prevention Large 14mm red sponge coral stretch bead bracelet

http://www.whitman-walker.org/
FREE SHIPPING IN USA.

Sponge coral is a beautiful and uncommon form of coral. It is not solid red but has small specks of beige included.

It is a rather large stone at 14mm and makes a statement when worn all alone.

name: BoyBeads Red Coral + Matte Black Onyx + Green Agate 10mm Handmade Bead Bracelet
description:
This listing is for one (1) BoyBeads Red Coral + Matte Black Onyx + Green Agate 10mm Handmade Bead Bracelet.

Thanks for looking at this beautiful natural stone stretch bracelet with 10mm stones. These are natural stones from the ground. These are NOT man-made or created plastic beads. Each bead was placed onto the elastic string by hand to make each of these fashionable bracelets.  
About Red Coral

Red Coral stimulates the energetic pursuit of pre-determined goals. It protects from depression and despondency. Treats hiccups, colic and heartburn. Aids in the release of impurities from the muscular system. Red Coral treats disorders of the kidneys, bladder and parathyroid.These bracelets can stretch but fit a wrist up to 7.0-8.0 inches around most comfortably. If you would like to request a special size, please include in the "notes" section in Paypal or e-mail BoyBeads@gmail.com for a special order. The price of your bracelet is based upon the number of stones used for its creation- this depends on the measurements of your wrists. Please see our price list here. These are perfectly unisex and can be worn by men, women and children. 

Any person would be fortunate to own such an elegant natural onyx/ agate/red coral bracelet!

name: Boybeads for the Cure- Charity Collection
description:
Thank you for viewing our custom handmade bracelets for men. $10 from the the sale of each bracelet in this collection will be donated to Men Against Breast Cancer, a non-profit organization in Washington, DC/Maryland that educates men on how they can help keep the women in their lives healthy and informed about breast cancer.

Help us raise money for this awesome non-profit group! You may also made a direct donation on their website here:
https://www.menagainstbreastcancer.org/donate/

All bracelets are handmade in New York and made with all natural stones.

FREE SHIPPING IN USA

https://www.menagainstbreastcancer.org/donate/

All bracelets are handmade in New York and made with all natural stones.
FREE SHIPPING IN USA

name: 10mm Natural Black Lava Beads stretch bracelet for men
description:
This is an amazing and very unique bead- one of the most striking I have ever seen! It does not have a smooth surface. It is a rough stone and will get softer/smoother with wear. It has a rocky surface that will grow to a darker shade of black after absorbing oils from the skin.

* As this is a heavier stone, each bracelet is triple stranded for maximum support and durability.

name: BoyBeads "Night and Day"  Blue Sea Sediment Jasper +Crescent Moon Handmade Bead Bracelet
description:
Her story:

A brass crescent moon sets in a "sky" of 10 natural blue sea sediment jasper stones amidst the darkness of the matte black onyx night. It is in but the best of company among five flaming gold "stars".

Design inspired by Cole Porter's "Night and Day". Measures 7.5".
Thanks for looking at this beautiful natural stone stretch bracelet with 10mm stones. These are natural stones from the ground. These are NOT man-made or created plastic beads. Each bead was placed onto the elastic string by hand to make each of these fashionable bracelets. 

Sea Sediment Jasper originates in China and has only recently been used in jewelry making due to its rarity. It is a very beautiful stone that varies in color from an aqua green/blue to deep navy hues with goldtone and white "veining".

These bracelets can stretch but fit a wrist up to 7.50-8.0 inches around most comfortably. If you would like to request a special size, please include in the "notes" section in Paypal or e-mail BoyBeads@gmail.com for a special order.

name: BoyBeads Billiards 8-Ball & Cue Ball Mens Handmade Bead Bracelet Set
description:
Thank you for looking at this beautiful set of natural bead stretch bracelets with 10mm stones. Each bead was placed onto the elastic string by hand to make each of these fashionable bracelets. The black "8-ball" bracelet is handcrafted with Peruvian clay bead that were painted black and the 8-ball was also painted on. These beads are very hard and can withstand a lot of pressure. Due to their being handcrafted, each bead is a little bit different from each other bead. The white "cue-ball" bracelet is crafted a a white coral stone and is great worn alone or paired with the 8-ball bracelet.

You may purchase the set or each bracelet individually. Please see the drop down menu next to the price to make your selection.
